title: JSON Schema for common plugin properties.
description: Meltano (https://meltano.com) is an open source platform for building, running & orchestrating ELT pipelines

logo_url.description: The url to retrieve the logo for this plugin.

pip_url.description: The pip hosted package name or URL

executable.description: The plugin's executable name, as defined in setup.py (if a Python based plugin)

repo.description: The URL to the repository where the plugin code lives.

ext_repo.description: The URL to the repository where the plugin extension code lives.

python.description: The python version to use for this plugin, specified as a path, or as the name of an executable to find within a directory in $PATH. If not specified, the top-level `python` setting will be used, or if it is not set, the python executable that was used to run Meltano will be used (within a separate virtual environment).

items.description: A set consisting of one valid combination of required setting names

label.description: A user friendly label describing the plugin

description.description: A description for what the plugin does

commands.description: An object containing commands to be run by the plugin, the keys are the name of the command and the values are the arguments to be passed to the plugin executable.

docs.description: A URL to the documentation for this plugin

hidden.description: Whether the plugin should be shown when listing or not.

log_parser.description: The log parser to use for parsing structured logs from this plugin. Used when the plugin supports structured logging.

supported_python_versions.description: A list of Python versions supported by this plugin in the format '3.x' (e.g., '3.10', '3.11').
